law.catch_line: Nuclear Power Plant Operators And Engineers; Minimum Supervising And Shift Requirements
law.text: Every nuclear power plant shall have at least one nuclear power plant senior supervising engineer. One nuclear power plant operating engineer and one assistant nuclear power plant operator shall be the minimum requirement for each working shift.
